title: Consolidate Parakeet provider into single file
description:
{
  "priority": 4,
  "type": "refactor",
  "context": "Merge 5 Parakeet files into single parakeet.py (~420 LOC). Currently split across parakeet.py, parakeet_core.py, parakeet_audio.py, parakeet_cache.py, parakeet_gpu.py. Other providers are single files.",
  "business_context": "Consistency with other providers (Deepgram, Whisper, ElevenLabs). Reduces abstractions.",
  "technical_requirements": [
    "Merge all parakeet_*.py files into single parakeet.py",
    "Use shared cache system instead of provider-specific",
    "Maintain all GPU optimization features",
    "Maintain all audio preprocessing",
    "Update imports in transcription service",
    "Run Parakeet provider tests"
  ],
  "success_criteria": [
    "Single src/providers/parakeet.py file",
    "All Parakeet functionality preserved",
    "Tests pass",
    "~80 LOC reduction from abstraction removal"
  ]
}

parsed_description.context: Merge 5 Parakeet files into single parakeet.py (~420 LOC). Currently split across parakeet.py, parakeet_core.py, parakeet_audio.py, parakeet_cache.py, parakeet_gpu.py. Other providers are single files.
parsed_description.business_context: Consistency with other providers (Deepgram, Whisper, ElevenLabs). Reduces abstractions.
